Articles.Content: My computer has got 8G ram, GTX 760 graphics card and i5 4670k cpu. I installed lots of mods to make it more realistic. But obviously, 32-bit's ram is not enough(especially after i installed hot rocket and enable the collision). So are there any plan to make this game 64-bit?

InneRs, you're new so maybe you have not seen, but this is a very frequent topic, and is dependent on Unity making a stable 64bit release, this is not something Squad has any control over.

As things are now there is a working 64bit Linux binary, Windows and OSX 64bit support is coming just as soon as Unity enables it.

I'm going to have to close this thread, it's been done to death, sorry.
